0.question: What is HomeCheff?
0.answer:
HomeCheff is a local platform where individuals can sell their handmade products. We focus on homemade dishes, fresh products from your own garden, and handmade creations. The platform connects local makers with consumers in their neighborhood.

üéØ Our mission: Reducing food waste by sharing surplus meals and products. If you cook for yourself and have too much, you can share it with others in your neighborhood. This contributes to a more sustainable and social community.

üí∞ PRACTICAL BENEFITS:
‚Ä¢ Extra income to fund your hobby
‚Ä¢ Deduct expenses from your revenue
‚Ä¢ Annual vacation (max ‚Ç¨2000)
‚Ä¢ Monthly supplement to benefits possible
‚Ä¢ Fund renovations or extras

1.question: How does HomeCheff work?
1.answer:
For private sellers, the platform is completely free! You only pay transaction fees so the app can continue to exist. Companies with a KVK number can choose a subscription. Buyers can search, filter, and buy local products.

ü§ù COMMUNITY:
‚Ä¢ Connect local makers and buyers
‚Ä¢ Reduce waste through sharing
‚Ä¢ Support handmade products
‚Ä¢ Stimulate conscious consumption

2.question: Is HomeCheff free to use?
2.answer: Yes! For private sellers, HomeCheff is completely free. You pay no monthly costs, only transaction fees on each sale. For companies with a KVK number, subscriptions are available.

3.question: In which cities is HomeCheff available?
3.answer: HomeCheff is currently available throughout the Netherlands. We focus on local communities and gradually expand to more regions.

4.question: How can I contact HomeCheff?
4.answer: You can reach us via support@homecheff.nl, our helpdesk in the app, or via the contact page. We usually respond within 24 hours.

5.question: Can I earn extra income alongside my benefits?
5.answer:
Yes, you can earn extra income alongside your benefits, but there are rules:

üí∞ BENEFITS AND EXTRA INCOME:
‚Ä¢ Wajong: 70% of your income is deducted from your benefits
‚Ä¢ Social assistance: You can keep part of your income
‚Ä¢ All income must be reported to the UWV within 1 week

üí° PRACTICAL TIPS:
‚Ä¢ Keep track of your expenses for deduction from your revenue
‚Ä¢ Consult with the UWV about your specific situation
‚Ä¢ Use your hobby to generate extra income
‚Ä¢ Take advantage of available exemptions

‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: Always contact the UWV before you start selling! HomeCheff is only a platform and does not provide tax or benefits advice.

6.question: What is HomeCheff's liability?
6.answer:
‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT LEGAL INFORMATION:

HomeCheff is only a platform that connects sellers and buyers. We are NOT responsible for:
‚Ä¢ Product quality
‚Ä¢ Disputes between sellers and buyers
‚Ä¢ Damage from products
‚Ä¢ Loss or theft during delivery
‚Ä¢ User tax returns
‚Ä¢ Benefits arrangements

All transactions are between seller and buyer. HomeCheff only mediates in disputes but is not liable for the outcome.

By using HomeCheff, you agree to these terms.

0.question: How do I become a seller on HomeCheff?
0.answer:
Register your account, choose a seller role (Chef, Garden, Designer), and fill in your bank details. For individuals, no subscription is needed - you can start selling immediately! Small businesses can optionally choose a subscription for favorable rates.

ü§ù LOCAL COMMUNITY:
‚Ä¢ Focus on reducing waste
‚Ä¢ Reuse materials and ingredients
‚Ä¢ Share your handmade story
‚Ä¢ Inspire others to consume consciously

1.question: What subscriptions are available for sellers?
1.answer:
For individuals: Completely free! You only pay transaction fees.

For small businesses, optional subscriptions are available with different rates. You can always upgrade or downgrade to another subscription.

ü§ù LOCAL COMMUNITY:

For specific prices and rates, you can log into your account and go to the subscription section.

3.answer:
Payouts happen automatically via Stripe Connect to your specified bank account.

‚è±Ô∏è PAYOUT PERIOD:
‚Ä¢ Normal orders: 7 days after payment (new accounts)
‚Ä¢ Faster payout: 2-3 business days (with positive history)
‚Ä¢ Shipping (parcel post): After delivery confirmation (escrow system)

üí∞ PRACTICAL BENEFITS:
‚Ä¢ Faster payout for handmade products
‚Ä¢ Extra reward for reducing waste
‚Ä¢ Transparent costs for local makers
‚Ä¢ Escrow protection for shipping

üìß NOTIFICATION:
You will receive an email when the payout is processed.

0.question: Are payments secure on HomeCheff?
0.answer: Yes, all payments are processed via Stripe, one of the world's most secure payment providers. Your banking details are never stored on our servers.

1.question: When is my money debited?
1.answer: Payments are debited immediately when you complete your order. For subscriptions, monthly automatic collection applies.

2.question: Can I cancel a payment?
2.answer: Payments can only be canceled before the transaction is completed. After completion, you must contact the seller or our customer service.

3.question: What are the transaction fees?
3.answer: Transaction fees vary by subscription type. These costs are automatically deducted from your sales revenue. For exact rates, log into your account and go to the subscription section.

4.question: Can I track my payouts?
4.answer:
Yes, you can track your payouts in your seller dashboard. There you'll see all transactions, payouts, and costs clearly together.

‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: HomeCheff is only a platform. We are not responsible for product quality or disputes between sellers and buyers.

0.question: How does delivery work on HomeCheff?
0.answer:

üì¶ DELIVERY OPTIONS:
‚Ä¢ Pickup: Customer picks up product from seller
‚Ä¢ Delivery: Seller delivers locally in the neighborhood
‚Ä¢ Shipping: Parcel post via DHL/PostNL (for Designer and Garden products)
‚Ä¢ Both: Combination of options

ü§ù LOCAL COMMUNITY:
‚Ä¢ Local delivery supports the neighborhood
‚Ä¢ Bike delivery is more practical
‚Ä¢ Pickup prevents extra packaging
‚Ä¢ Shipping works nationally and internationally

‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: HomeCheff is only a platform. We are not responsible for delivery or disputes between sellers and buyers.

3.answer: Contact the seller immediately. If that doesn't work, we can mediate. Keep your payment proof for any claims.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.subtitle: Your privacy and security are our priority
privacyPage.safeDataStorageDesc: All personal data is encrypted and stored securely, accessible only to you and our secure systems.
privacyPage.noDataSharingDesc: We never share your personal information with third parties. Your data remains private and is only used for the operation of the app.
privacyPage.fullControlDesc: You always have full control over your data. You can delete your account and all data will be permanently deleted.
privacyPage.transparencyDesc: We are completely transparent about how we use your data. No hidden tracking or data collection.
privacyPage.essentialDataEmail: Email address: For account verification and communication
privacyPage.essentialDataName: Name: For personal recognition on the platform
privacyPage.essentialDataPassword: Password: Encrypted and stored for account security
privacyPage.optionalDataLocation: Location: Only if you explicitly allow it for local products
privacyPage.optionalDataAddress: Address: Only for delivery of orders
privacyPage.encryptionDesc: All sensitive data is encrypted with industry-standard encryption (AES-256). Passwords are hashed with bcrypt.
privacyPage.secureServersDesc: Our servers run in secure data centers with 24/7 monitoring and regular security audits.
privacyPage.accessControlDesc: Only authorized personnel have access to systems, and all access is logged and monitored.
privacyPage.rightToAccessDesc: You can always request an overview of all data we have stored about you.
privacyPage.rightToCorrectionDesc: You can always adjust or correct your data via your profile settings.
privacyPage.rightToDeletionDesc: You can permanently delete your account and all associated data.
privacyPage.rightToPortabilityDesc: You can export your data in a standard format for use elsewhere.
privacyPage.minimalCookieUseDesc: We only use essential cookies that are necessary for the operation of the app:
privacyPage.sessionCookies: Session cookies: To keep you logged in
privacyPage.preferenceCookies: Preference cookies: For your language and theme settings
privacyPage.noTrackingCookies: No tracking cookies, advertising cookies or third-party analytics.
privacyPage.contactDesc: Do you have questions about this privacy policy or want to exercise your rights? Contact us:

affiliate.howItWorksDesc: From signup to payout, everything automatically arranged
affiliate.step1Desc: Click the button below and you'll immediately get your unique referral link and access to your dashboard. No costs, no obligations.
affiliate.step2: Share your link or promo code
affiliate.step2Desc: Share your referral link or create a promo code and send it to businesses that want a subscription. From now on you can register businesses for 12 months.
affiliate.step3Desc: As soon as a user or business becomes active via your link, you automatically earn commission: 25% per user (50% if you bring both) or 50% per business. All commissions are automatically tracked and paid weekly.
affiliate.step4Desc: Commissions are automatically paid weekly via Stripe Connect. No hassle, everything arranged.

affiliate.contractTermsDesc: The first 12 months are guaranteed with the 50-50 deal. After 12 months, the contract can be renewed under the same terms, or HomeCheff may choose to change the rates. You will be notified at least 30 days in advance of any rate changes.
affiliate.contractRenewalDesc: After 12 months, your contract can be automatically renewed under the same terms. HomeCheff reserves the right to change rates, but you will be informed at least 30 days in advance. You can stop at any time without obligations.
affiliate.guaranteed12MonthsDesc: The first 12 months of your affiliate contract are guaranteed with the 50-50 deal. All commissions you earn during this period will be paid according to the agreed rates, regardless of any future changes.

promoCodes.title: Promo Codes
promoCodes.noPromoCodesDesc: Create your first promo code to start offering discounts
promoCodes.forBusinessSubscriptions: For business subscriptions: discount comes from your 50% commission
promoCodes.discountExplanation: This percentage is of YOUR commission, not of the total price. The discount amount comes from your share, HomeCheff's share always remains the same.
promoCodes.discountExplanationDetail: EXAMPLE: For a ‚Ç¨100 subscription, a main affiliate gets ‚Ç¨50 commission (50% of ‚Ç¨100). If you give 20% discount, that means 20% of YOUR ‚Ç¨50 = ‚Ç¨10 discount. The business pays ‚Ç¨90, you get ‚Ç¨40 (from your ‚Ç¨50 commission), and HomeCheff always gets ‚Ç¨50.
promoCodes.discountExplanationSubDetail: SUB-AFFILIATES: For a ‚Ç¨100 subscription, a sub-affiliate gets ‚Ç¨40 commission (40% of ‚Ç¨100, which is 80% of the main affiliate's ‚Ç¨50). You can give maximum 75% of YOUR ‚Ç¨40 = ‚Ç¨30 discount. The business pays ‚Ç¨70, you get ‚Ç¨10 (25% of your ‚Ç¨40 commission = 10% of total), and your parent affiliate gets ‚Ç¨10.
promoCodes.maxDiscountRuleMain: You can give maximum 80% of your own commission as discount. You must always keep at least 20% of your commission (10% of the total price). This can be via discount OR via a sub-affiliate.
promoCodes.maxDiscountRuleSub: As a sub-affiliate, you receive 40% commission (80% of the main affiliate's 50% commission). From your ‚Ç¨40 commission you can give maximum ‚Ç¨30 discount (75%). You must always keep at least ‚Ç¨10 (25% of your commission = 10% of the total price).
promoCodes.maxDiscountDesc: Maximum 80% discount (you must always keep at least 20% of your commission).
promoCodes.maxDiscountDescSub: Maximum 75% discount of your own commission. As a sub-affiliate you receive 40% commission and must always keep at least 25% of it (10% of the total price).
promoCodes.maxDiscountError: You can give a maximum of {max}% discount. You must always keep at least 20% of your commission.
promoCodes.maxDiscountErrorSub: You can give a maximum of {max}% discount of your own commission. As a sub-affiliate you must always keep at least 25% of your commission (10% of the total price).

passiveIncome.subtitle: Discover how you can build a significant monthly income with minimal effort.
passiveIncome.scenarioDesc: Imagine you bring an average of just 2 businesses per month that sign up for a Pro subscription (‚Ç¨99/month). That's just 1 business every 2 weeks ‚Äì very realistic with your network or via local outreach!
passiveIncome.after12Months: After 12 months you have a stable passive income of ‚Ç¨1,188 per month!

affiliate.ownYourAreaDesc: Become the owner of your neighborhood, village, or city. As an affiliate, you build a local market that generates passive income. Perfect for artists, vloggers, local heroes, and anyone who wants to monetize their network.

financialSecurity.title: Secure Your Financial Future for the Long Term
financialSecurity.subtitle: Build a lasting passive income that continues for years
financialSecurity.mainMessage: With the HomeCheff Affiliate Program, you can secure your financial future for the long term. By starting now to bring in businesses and users, you're building a passive income that continues for months and years to come.

keyPoints.point1Desc: Every referral you bring earns you commission for 12 months. Even if you bring someone on day 364, you still get a full year of commission.
keyPoints.point2Desc: Once you've built up a stable number of referrals, your income continues - even if you stop bringing in new referrals. Your passive income grows month after month.
keyPoints.point3Desc: No investment needed, no monthly costs, no hidden fees. Every euro you earn is pure profit. You can stop at any time without loss.
keyPoints.point4Desc: The more you bring in, the higher your passive income becomes. With 2 businesses per month, you build a monthly passive income of ‚Ç¨1,378 in 12 months - and it keeps going!

financialSecurity.exampleDesc: Imagine: You bring in 2 businesses per month for 12 months. After 12 months you have:
financialSecurity.exampleContinues: And this continues - year after year - without needing to bring in new referrals!
financialSecurity.securityMessage: This is real financial security. You're building an income that keeps going, regardless of what happens in the future. Start today and secure your financial future for years to come.
